item.title: About
item.description: À propos Je suis chercheur postdoctorant en sciences cognitives @ l’Université de Gand. Mes recherches portent sur la façon dont nous représentons et utilisons de nouvelles informations de manière flexible pour intéragir avec le monde. Research Interest My research focuses on studying the flexibility of perceptual and mnesic representations at behavioral and neural levels, and the cognitive control mechanisms that allow to flexibly use these information to perform various tasks.

item.title: Other activities
item.description: Collective/administrative responsibilities 2019-2021: Responsible for the purchase of two eye-tracking devices for an EEG platform at the Department of Experimental Psychology at Ghent University, and the MRI platform at Ghent University Hospital. Market research, budget calculation, ordering and organization of training provided by the company providing the eye trackers (SR-Research). Administrative and technical support following the purchase. Since 2020: Member of the oculometry support group - Department of Experimental Psychology, Ghent University.
